title: Bitcoin Can't Finance A War: The Crypto Industry And Being On The Right Side Of History - Forbes
content: Bitcoin Can't Finance A War: The Crypto Industry And Being On The Right Side Of History  Forbes
description: Crypto has become the go to currency for the Ukrainian Government defending itself from Russia. But crypto has a PR problem with Western governments keen to enforce sanctions. Most recognize cryptocurrency will not fund a war, but sanctions are the crypto industry's most critical test to date.
